entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of type '' when running Add-Migration in PMC #32837
  • EF Core creating a .config folder #32836
  • Migrations add doesn't work with Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #32835
  • How make a query with join and or condition? #32828
  • Raw SQL literal with GO on a new line of that literal fails when executing migration #32826
  • ExecuteDeleteAsync throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException when an owned entity is present and LINQ operators are composed #32823
  • Switch to managing projection/column aliases via ISqlAliasManager as well #32821
  • Compiled Query Issue #32820

Closed

  • Change T4-generated file name for scaffolded entities #32804
  • Migrations does not warn for unspecified decimals in ComplexProperty types #32827
  • ExecuteDeleteAsync fails when an owned entity exists and the query isn't supported natively (subquery form) #29690
  • Contains translates to correlated query when the item is nullable #32574
    8.0.x
  • GroupBy debug assert: Missing alias in the list: p1,p #26104
    Backlog
  • Clean table alias generation and generate unique aliases up-front #32784
  • Query contains non-consecutive table aliases when tables are pruned #32757
  • Set context_info in ef core #32814
  • what's different between use and not use await base.OnAfterRenderAsync #32808
  • Compiled Models in EF8 generates different SQL #32779
  • . #32822

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3mc from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32834
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32833
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix SelectExpression cloning when client projections are present #32824

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 and SQLitePCLRaw.core #32830
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 and SQLitePCLRaw.core #32829
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32832
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Redo SQL table alias management #32785

Updated

  • Use table mappings for FromSql #32816
  • Add back some methods to the compiled model that are used for customization #32805
  • Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals #32788
